.. _Tutorial:

==============================
MiLoMerge Tutorials
==============================

As it stands right now, there are no official tutorials for this package. While one will be
created shortly, a good way to learn how to use the package in the meantime is through
the test cases (:ref:`Tests`) or through the short example writeups (:ref:`Examples`).

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   :hidden:
   
   Tests
   Examples
